official_title: A bill to establish a Commission to Study the Quality of Instruction at the Service Academies.

summary.text: Establishes a Commission to Study the Quality of Instruction at the Service Academies to: (1) study the quality of instruction and training at the service academies; (2) study the feasibility of including more civilian professors and instructors; and (3) study the rules of the academies concerning the conduct of cadets. Directs the Commission to transmit a report to the President and to each House of Congress not later than one year after the enactment of this Act containing a statement of findings and conclusions of the Commission. Terminates the Commission 90 days after the submission of its report.

titles.title: A bill to establish a Commission to Study the Quality of Instruction at the Service Academies.
